titleStmt.title: Kuttālam [Turutti - KT037], X temple, time of X, year X

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

xiv
tirumañcaṇattuṟaikkukkiḻakku cempiyanmātevikkamukam toṭṭam pattumāvukkuṅ Aḻakiyacoḻan kamukantoṭṭam nālu māvukkum vaṭakku kāveri niroṭu kālukku te
ṟku connavāṟaṟivā[r*] nilattil kiḻellai tiruvaḻun=tūr nilattukku meṟku naṭuvupaṭṭa Iṭam niroṭu kālāyummaṇaṟkuṉṟāyum kiṭan=ta Iṭam Ittevaṟku talavukāracāmavetamum tait=rīyavetamum
cantokasāmavetamum Attiyayanam paṇṇum b=rāh=maṇar Irupattaivaṟku tirutti kulai Aṭṭikkamukam ṟu Iṭṭu Anupavikka nipantamāka Ipparicu nivantam ceytom māṭalan maticūtarcāttanāna
yimparanāyarpaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ipparicu nivan=tañ[cey*]tu kuṭuttom māṭilan coticoḻapāṇṭiyan Eḻuttu Ipparicu nivan=tam ceytom māṭilannātittañcāttanāna pañcavanmātevipaṭṭaneḻuttu
Ipparicu nivan=tañceytom māṭalanāṉūṟṟeṇman piccan Eḻuttu [||*]
This edition by Nicolas Cane (2024), based on autopsy, photographs, and published visual documentation.
